songs.title: Everybody
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
So everybody rappers, that’s what everybody do now
Everybody claiming with she shit, this was cool now
Everybody killers, everybody wanna shoot now
Everybody real, everybody tell the truth now
My city moved forward, this it’s time for me to move out
My city moved forward, this it’s time for me to move out
My city moved forward, this it’s time for me to move out
My city moved forward, this it’s time for me to move out
[Verse]
Dropping tears, while you drop the L’z, but ain’t cool now
You tryna get what up, out the gang, bring the fool out
Out the way to heaven, but ya ain’t ready for that cruise now
Polo you gon last, what the fuck is you gon do now
Polo, he gon blast, shit, you know I bring ‘em 2s out
I used to be chill, but they say I come fool now
They like Polo crazy, I listen to a couple screws now
Bitches used to diss me, they lined up and I catch you now
I gotta mail “Bitch I’m sad, I hope they ain’t seduce now”
Know I’m finna eat, they already got their spoons out
Feeling like my bitch, when they say “I got the juice now”
I got a dream team, so I feel like I can’t lose now
Son got the songs, surprising now I’m in my crew now
Bitch I’m on a mission, all them haters getting turned out
Opps gon’ last, since a new patch coming soon now
Like the coming killer, I’m young and I bring ‘em goons out
Slide when it’s dark, we like the drill when the moon’s out
Fuck ‘em off, excuse to block my niggas, bring ‘em bones out
Chopper shooting loud, yeah nigga we bring ‘em boom loud
Bitch, hit this bitch, blowing clears the whole world now
[Chorus]
So everybody rappers, that’s what everybody do now
Everybody claiming with the shit, this was cool now
Everybody killers, everybody wanna shoot now
Everybody real, everybody tell the truth now
My city moved forward, this it’s time for me to move out
My city moved forward, this it’s time for me to move out
My city moved forward, this it’s time for me to move out
My city moved forward, this it’s time for me to move out
[Verse]
If it ain’t real life, you my bitch, drive me crazy and my OG, she be tripping to
Real hard hit it, granny the only person I listen to
People with their hands out, fall back, I don’t got shit for you
Daddys want the Glock, I can only get my dick to you
New day different shoes
Mix, match and design and I got tail, that I’m dripping to
I’m living like if this was my younger me and I didn’t get to do
Long live my niggas, bitch, the gang where they living through
Slide down West, I’m a genius when I hit the stew
They say real Gs move in silence, where I’m living trough
I ain’t love my mouth doing all that talking when I’m in a boof
And I ain’t telling lies, I’m the right, all that shit is true
They tryna take my mama’s car shop, until I pick a crew
Probably on a meal, go get it and split it with the crew
Ain’t no fake love, make sure it ain’t none of my niggas crew
Only had my brother’s day-ones, ain’t no niggas new
My boys some animals, don’t make me laugh when gorillas lose
Niggas get to say that pocket-rockets make a nigga juice
Before they get to blow it, then I gotta screws to trigger to
This shit ain’t a gang, but we already get ready
You’re grizzy, the more we come back
The way that bitch had finished you, her long tips get to ripping you
Catch you a lack in this crack and bitches didn’t even get it to
Catch you a lack in this crack and bitches didn’t even get it to
[Chorus]
So everybody rappers, that’s what everybody do now
Everybody claiming with the shit, this was cool now
Everybody killers, everybody wanna shoot now
Everybody real, everybody tell the truth now
My city moved forward, this it’s time for me to move out
My city moved forward, this it’s time for me to move out
My city moved forward, this it’s time for me to move out
My city moved forward, this it’s time for me to move out
[Outro]
Bitch
Bitch
Polo line it up, Polo line it up
